briefdescription.para: Pointer to the Path Following algorithm to use.
Auxiliar variables to store the current vehicle state and path values.
Auxiliary variables to check whether we have received the first information for intial path position and vehicle state.
Use to store the time-elapsed to be used by the controller.
Nodle Handler attributes.
ROS Services for path following.
ROS Services auxiliary to the path following.
ROS publishers attributes.
ROS subscribers attributes.
ROS Timer attributes.
The constructor of the path following node.
The destructor of the path following node (where the subscribers, publishers and services are terminated)
Method to allocate memory for a default PF controller class.

detaileddescription.para: Alocates memory for the default controller to be used. In this case is Lapierre.

briefdescription.para: Alocates memory for a default controller. In this case is Brevik.
Method to delete the current controller being used.

detaileddescription.para: Deletes safely the current path following object.

briefdescription.para: Method to stop the current path_following.

detaileddescription.para: Auxiliar method to stop the algorithm.

briefdescription.para: Method to initialize the ROS part.
Method to initialize the publishers of the path following node.
A method for initializing all the services. This method is called by the constructor of the PathNode class upon creation.
Initialize the timer callback.
Setup the Node working frequency.
Method where the logic is located in order to update the control law.
Callbacks.

detaileddescription.para: Vc callback used to update the correction velocity for cooperative path following.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to an std_msgs::Float64 with the synchronization speed for the virtual target gamma

briefdescription.para: Path state callback to update the path data.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a dsor_paths::PathData that contains information of the path

briefdescription.para: Vehicle state callback to update the state of the vehicle.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a auv_msgs::NavigationStatus that contains information regarding the vehicle

briefdescription.para: Auxiliar method to stop the algorithm.
Services callbacks.
Service to send a waypoint when the path following stops.

detaileddescription.para: Auxiliar method to send a hold position waypoint.

parameterdescription.para: -3 to hold the pos after the vehicle, -1 to hold position on the spot

briefdescription.para: Service to reset the DeadReckoning position when the path following stops.

detaileddescription.para: Auxiliar method to reset the DeadReckoning postion

briefdescription.para: Path Following Node, where the magic happens.
